title: Kaishun
description:
by Niu

Shouto always knew that Katsuki Bakugou was intense, but he never thought that intensity would affect him so much.

Words: 1198, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Todoroki Enji | Endeavor, Yagi Toshinori | All Might, Aizawa Shouta | Eraserhead, Class 1-A (My Hero Academia)

  • Additional Tags: Get Together, Shouto needs a hug, Polyamorous relationship, Katsuki is awesome, Izuku can convince anyone of anything, Falling In Love, Future Fic, The Redemption of Endeavor, Poetry, Friends to Lovers

blog.name: untilthefirenationattacked
blog.title: ᴵ ʷᵃⁿᵗ ᵗᵒ ˢᵉᵉ ᵐʸ ˡⁱᵗᵗˡᵉ ᵇᵒʸ
blog.description: moved from @/katsukibakuthot

summary: A concept: 50% off Haruka Nanase but it's Todoroki
body:
A concept: 50% off Haruka Nanase but it’s Todoroki

An example:

Todoroki’s brain: Crap, Shouto, Iida’s stopped talking. He wants you to respond. Say something stupid!

Todoroki: I wasn’t thinking about killing you.

Iida: Aww thank you.

Todoroki’s brain: Nailed it!

blog.name: bokunoheroacademialove
blog.title: Plus Ultra Headcanons!
blog.description: Sup! I'm Pheo (she/her) and I write oneshots/drabbles/headcanons for BNHA/MHA!  Please check my rules before submitting! REQUESTS ARE OPEN Masterlist

summary: Can I get Hitoshi Shinsou with general relationship hc? Btw your writing is amazing. Bless you and your amazing work. ❤️❤️❤️❤️
question: Can I get Hitoshi Shinsou with general relationship hc? Btw your writing is amazing. Bless you and your amazing work. ❤️❤️❤️❤️
answer:
Thank you!!! Some soft boi Shinsou coming your way~

Shinsou

💜The beginning of your relationship is 100% mostly you talking and Shinsou just…listening. It can be awkward sometimes when you run out of topics, or when he looks zoned out and disinterested. Really, he’s just slow to trust and is trying to feel you out. 

💜Once he gets more comfortable he’ll slowly open up. Maybe he starts being a more active listener, throwing in his opinions here and there, and eventually he’ll be comfortable enough to just treat you as a good and close friend. 

💜When you hold hands it won’t come up for a while if you leave it to Shinsou. He’ll probably not realize it’s socially acceptable for him to hold your hand and the idea genuinely will not enter his mind for a while. He’ll just grab it at the most random moment and that’s that. If you do it he’ll freeze up a little, maybe grow tense, but he’s not uncomfortable. In fact, he’ll probably have a lopsided grin on his face.

💜If your short enough he’s totally that asshole who leans on you to piss you off. He just wants to see your reaction the first time he does it, and it’s just so endearing to see you get all fussy and slap his arm away.

💜Loves to gently press kisses to the back of your hand when he’s holding it or your forehead as you two get close. He’s awful at any big declarations of love so being able to throw in smaller signs of affection are much more his cup of tea. 

💜Likes low key dates, like just studying together or taking walks around campus, or even small movie dates. That’s not to say he won’t take you out to do more big and fun stuff, but he likes to have smaller and intimate moments with you! 

💜No matter how long you’ve been dating, to outsiders he might seem distant. He doesn’t excitedly rush around to find you/meet you and isn’t too big on PDA ever. Really it just kinda looks like he hangs around you more than anyone else. But in reality if Shinsou actively hangs out with you and talks to you it should be obvious he likes you. 

      💜The most risky he’ll get on PDA during school would probably just be him leanhing his head against yours or on your shoulder. He’s just not that into PDA. You might be able to sneak in holding hands or kissing his cheek every so often depending on his mood, though.

💜Refuses to use his quirk on you. The fact you’re so unafraid of his quirk and trust him so much is heartwarming for him and reassures him in more ways than one. He would never break that trust, no matter what. Now, if you somehow meandered your way into a life or death situation where you were unable to do something on your own, yeah, he’d probably be willing to use his quirk if it meant saving your life. But in general life that shit ain’t ever happening.

blog.name: detroitsmashthatlikebutton
blog.title: IT'S CRAWLING IN MY SKIN
blog.description:
awkward in the streets worse in the sheets

artist trying his best

title: Kaishun
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://archiveofourown.org/works/19064659

by Niu

Shouto always knew that Katsuki Bakugou was intense, but he never thought that intensity would affect him so much.

Words: 1198, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Todoroki Enji | Endeavor, Yagi Toshinori | All Might, Aizawa Shouta | Eraserhead, Class 1-A (My Hero Academia)
  • Relationships: Bakugou Katsuki/Midoriya Izuku/Todoroki Shouto, Bakugou Katsuki/Midoriya Izuku, Bakugou Katsuki/Todoroki Shouto, Midoriya Izuku/Todoroki Shouto
  • Additional Tags: Get Together, Shouto needs a hug, Polyamorous relationship, Katsuki is awesome, Izuku can convince anyone of anything, Falling In Love, Future Fic, The Redemption of Endeavor, Poetry, Friends to Lovers

blog.name: amym32687
blog.title: Rogue-Slayer Art
blog.description: My entire profile Amy32687 got blocked with the new Tumblr ban so I had to create an entire new profile to get my art seen. Please follow, comment, and reblog anything you like. Asks always welcome. <3 My Twitter is @LoveBitchPuddin. My DeviantArt is Rogue-Slayer. My Instagram is PatriciaMollohan. My Patreon is www.patreon.com/Rogue_Slayer. If you like my art please check it out!
